title: Phowned!
overview: Playing on human foibles and raw emotion, Phowned! celebrates the art of the perfect gag phone call. The show features phone calls to sons, daughters, parents, and friends and showcases how easily people's buttons are pushed to the limit with fresh and unique story lines. The team of Phowned! callers is made up of America's most experienced gag phone call generators from the "Elvis Duran Morning Show", heard on New York's top rated Z-100, and syndicated nationally.
